meanings.definition: A small cup-shaped structure, especially one of the bracts surrounding the head of a composite flower.
meanings.sent1: The calyculi protected the delicate flower buds.
meanings.sent2: The botanist carefully examined the calyculi of the daisy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the calyculi as tiny hats.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the garden like the calyculi holding the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The calyculi resembled miniature bowls cradling the blossoms.

meanings.definition: A small cup-shaped structure, especially one of the bracts surrounding the head of a composite flower.
meanings.sent1: Tiny insects sought shelter under the calyculi.
meanings.sent2: The calyculi added a unique charm to the floral arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the calyculi were secret hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The sun set behind the hills, casting shadows like calyculi around the garden.
meanings.sent5: The calyculi cradled the flower heads gently, protecting them from the wind.
